Developer Terms of Use
des:
StarsTell.com is a premium e-commerce portal for Online Astrological Consultations, Remedial Products and Online Puja Services. Association of cyber space and astro space is helping thousands of our satisfied online customers and providing a dedicated platform for Vedic Astrologers.

'Durga Pujan' has religious, spiritual and cultural significance. At the same time, 'Durga Pujan' or 'Durga Sadhana' is the way of achieving the ‘Ashta Siddhi'. During NavRatri festival, devotees worship Mata Rani and pray to alleviate their sufferings. Maa Durga is kind enough to Her devotees and definitely showers Her grace on them. Devi Durga can be worshipped every day, but Navratri is considered to be the best for ‘Durga Sadhana’, four times throughout the year. Chaitra Navratri, Ashwin Navratri and two Gupt Navratri are having their own special significance.
